data.title: Amnon
data.meta_description: Amnon is a strong and unique Hebrew name for baby boys, with historical significance and rarity in the United States..
data.text:
Meaning of Amnon

Amnon is a strong and unique name for baby boys. It has Hebrew origins and is pronounced as ahm-NOHN (/ɑmˈnoʊn/). In terms of popularity, Amnon is not very common in the United States, with only five occurrences in 2021, ranking it at 12,119th place. Despite its rarity, Amnon carries a rich historical significance. In the Bible, Amnon was the eldest son of King David and had associations with bravery and leadership. This name exudes an air of strength and individuality, making it an excellent choice for parents seeking a distinctive yet meaningful name for their baby boy.

Pronunciation

Hebrew
